translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
UPNW Train #635- Delayed
UPNW train #635 scheduled to arrive Des Plaines at 4:10 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to mechanical problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Are Open - Canopies Refurbished (Update)

The University Park canopy refurbishing project is complete. Passengers have full access to the east and west station and parking lot platform entrances. Metra appreciates your patience throughout the project.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service.
The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service. Customers can use 55th/56th/57th Street or 103rd Street/Roosmoor as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 147th Street/Sibley elevator is back in service.
The 147th Street/Sibley elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 10 through Sunday, January 11

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 10 through Sunday, January 11. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 10 through Sunday, January 11

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 10 through Sunday, January 11. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St./Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 10 through Sunday, January 11. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Metra Electric District Extra train to depart 30 minutes at the conclusion of Chicago Football Playoff Game

The Metra Electric District will operate an extra train to depart 30 minutes at the conclusion of the Chicago Football Playoff Game at Soldier Field for anticipation of larger than normal crowds. Visit metra.com for more information.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 55th/56th/57th Street West elevator is back in service.
The 55th/56th/57th Street West elevator is back in service.

BNSF #1282 - Expressing
BNSF train #1282 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 6:02PM will express from LaGrange Rd to Cicero due to operational issues. Train #1284 will accommodate customers at intermediate stops.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 10 through Sunday, January 11. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 25 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.

UPNW Train #664- Will Not Operate
UPNW  train #664, scheduled to depart Crystal Lake at 5:45 PM, will not operate due to mechanical problems. Train #668, scheduled to depart Harvard at 6:20 PM will accommodate  passengers.
